name: org.eclipse.che.ls.json
script:
CHE_HOME=$HOME/che-agents
LS_HOME=$CHE_HOME/ls-json


if [ ! -d "$LS_HOME" ];  then mkdir -p $LS_HOME; fi
wget -qO - https://codenvy.com/update/repository/public/download/org.eclipse.che.ls.json.binaries | tar -C $LS_HOME -xzf -

MACHINE_TYPE=`uname -m`
if [ ${MACHINE_TYPE} == 'x86_64' ]; then
    NODEJS=node-v0.12.9-linux-x64
else
    NODEJS=node-v0.12.9-linux-x86
fi
NODEJS_HOME=$CHE_HOME/$NODEJS

if [ ! -f "$NODEJS_HOME/bin/node" ];  then 
    wget -qO - https://nodejs.org/dist/v0.12.9/$NODEJS.tar.gz | tar -C $CHE_HOME -xzf -
fi    

touch $LS_HOME/launch.sh
echo "$NODEJS_HOME/bin/node $LS_HOME/vscode-json-server/server.js" > $LS_HOME/launch.sh
chmod +x $LS_HOME/launch.sh
